label: 扶桑略記
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: This is a history of Japan by Priest Kōen, teacher of Priest Genkū. Of the original thirty books (kan) only fourteen have been preserved, covering the period from the first year of Jingō [or Jingū]-Kōgō (c. A.D. 363) to1094 (Part A, p. 365).  [皇円、源空、巻、神功皇后]
